situation: M felt overwhelmed during a noisy gym class. He began to cover his ears and displayed visible signs of distress, such as crying and retreating to a corner.
action: The aide guided M to a quieter area and provided noise-canceling headphones from his kit. She demonstrated deep breathing exercises to help him calm down. Once settled, they slowly reintroduced him to the class by watching from afar.
effect: M was able to return to class without further incident after using the headphones and practicing deep breathing. This allowed him to reengage with peers in a controlled manner.
